description: Oh mom, do we have to go now? We were just getting comfortable.
Stay between the lines, the lines are our friends.
Hurry back mom, I've been waiting here for you for what seems like forever.
Having some good cuddle time with my client's buddy.
Just taking a little breather after a nice hike up here in the mountains.
Where does one go for a good place to nap around here?
Waiting patiently for my mom and dad to come home from work.
